knimeNode.name: PIAGeneratePipelineXML
knimeNode.shortDescription: Create a new pipeline for PIA execution.

intro.p: This node is the starting node for each PIA pipeline. It creates an XML file, which contains all further pipeline executions.

fullDescription.option: Additional Java settings, like giving Java a big enough amount of memory (which is recommended).
the name of the new PIA pipeline

views.view: The text sent to standard out during the execution of PIAGeneratePipelineXML.
The text sent to standard error during the execution of PIAGeneratePipelineXML. (If it appears in gray, it's the output of a previously failing run which is preserved for your trouble shooting.)
